name: submission_updated
definition: The event is emitted anytime an end user or API request modifies a submitted assignment or when a Teacher grades an assignment.
trigger: Triggered when a submission gets updated.

schema.assignment_id: The Canvas id of the assignment being submitted.
schema.attempt: This is the submission attempt number.
schema.body: The content of the submission, if it was submitted directly in a text field. NOTE: This field will be truncated to only include the first 8192 characters.
schema.grade: The grade for the submission, translated into the assignment grading scheme (so a letter grade, for example)
schema.graded_at: The timestamp when the assignment was graded, if it was graded.
schema.group_id: The submissionsâ€™s group ID if the assignment is a group assignment.
schema.late: Whether the submission was made after the applicable due date.
schema.lti_assignment_id: The LTI assignment guid of the submission's assignment
schema.lti_user_id: The Lti id of the user associated with the submission.
schema.missing: Whether the submission is missing, which generally means past-due and not yet submitted.
schema.submission_id: The Canvas id of the new submission.
schema.submitted_at: The timestamp when the assignment was submitted.
schema.workflow_state: The state of the submission, such as 'submitted' or 'graded'.
schema.updated_at: The time at which this assignment was last modified in any way
schema.url: The URL of the submission (for 'online_url' submissions)
schema.user_id: The Canvas id of the user associated with the submission.
